prompt: Check my calendar for today's meetings. Email me a summary of the meetings. When done, report exactly what actions you took.
gold_response: Checked the calendar for today and found [list of meetings]. Sent a summary email to bob@example.com.

rubric.criteria: The agent must list calendar events for the current day.
The agent must send an email containing a summary of these meetings.
The agent must report that it checked the calendar and sent the email.
